text: Attin is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in northern France. ==Geography== A small village situated only 2 miles (3 km) north of Montreuil- sur-Mer, on the N39 road. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de- Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Attin
